archimate:BusinessRole.name: CIRT Specialist
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: The CSIRT (Computer Security Incident Response Team) Specialist is tasked with responding to and managing security incidents within an organization. This role involves a high level of expertise in various areas of cybersecurity, including incident detection, analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery. They are responsible for conducting thorough investigations into security breaches, utilizing forensic tools and techniques to understand the scope and impact of the incident.
